title: New: Hint – Aliens Enter Feat. T Fly
body:
This new cut from prolific producer **Hint** has far and away the slickest beat I’ve heard this year; refreshingly unique and instantaneously addictive.

Featuring Austin rapper **T Fly**, whose flow is slightly weak at times, yet her harsh delivery forms an intriguing contrast to the more jovial beat. _Aliens Enter_ is taken from **Hint’s** upcoming 10″ release **_Daily Intake_** out 30 January.

 [Hint – Aliens Enter Feat T Fly](http://soundcloud.com/tru-thoughts/hint-aliens-enter-feat-t-fly) by [Tru Thoughts](http://soundcloud.com/tru-thoughts)
